document_data.name: Erve
document_data.mainbody: '''Erve''' was a priest of [[Jergal]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Erve went to an abandoned temple of [[Waukeen]] to take an inventory of the dead buried in the church's graveyard and crypt. However, some of the builders of the temple were secretly cultists of [[Graz'zt]] and their leader, by now a [[shadow demon]], possessed Erve. Under demonic possession, Erve re-opened the temple as a sanctuary to Graz'zt.{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|40}}

Around [[1492 DR]] Erve joined the army that tried to free Phlan from the [[Vorgansharax]].{{Cite adventurers league/Reclamation of Phlan|6}}
document_data.Relationship: Erve had dealings with the [[Order of the Gauntlet]].{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|40}}
